title: Motion (Soto-Martinez – Blumenfield) relative to amending the Los Angeles Municipal Code to meet the requirements of the Americans with Disabilities Act Title II Regulations, as amended by the Title II Web and Mobile Accessibility Final Rule and including Subpart H requirements.

appearances.section: Items for which Public Hearings Have Been Held
appearances.recommendation: REQUEST the City Attorney to work with the City's code publisher(s) to implement revisions to the LAMC for ADA compliance purposes as needed to correct identified non-substantive, technical errors through a similar approach as was implemented through Council file No. 23-0047 (Gender References / Los Angeles Municipal Code / Amendment), which did not require a formal ordinance process. Fiscal Impact Statement: Neither the City Administrative Officer nor the Chief Legislative Analyst has completed a financial analysis of this report. Community Impact Statement: None submitted. Report from Rules, Elections and Intergovernmental Relations Committee 11-07-25 Motion (Soto-Martinez - Blumenfield) dated 10-22-25

attachments.title: Report from Rules, Elections and Intergovernmental Relations Committee 11-07-25
